1.0.name: wordpress/techtunes-widget
1.0.description:
Customizable widget which displays the latest technology tune from Techtunes.com.bd

Just Download and upload this plugin to your wordpress plugin directory and Active this,Add the widget to your sidebar from Appearance->Widgets and configure the widget options.

Check my other plugin

Stay tuned,and do your updates... Techtunes Widget has Spirit!

Feature List

  • Displays a user-defined number of recent tunes from bangla blog techtunes
  • Displays techtunes current featured tunes title with link
